body_html: Thanks for your feedback, I think I tended to everything. Also thanks for introducing me to empty-cells, Max. I couldn't get it to work and already blamed my lame CSS skills when I learned that apparently Bootstrap's border-collapse conflicts with empty-cells. Hm.

body: Thanks for your feedback, I think I tended to everything. Also thanks for introducing me to `empty-cells`, Max. I couldn't get it to work and already blamed my lame CSS skills when I learned that apparently Bootstrap's border-collapse conflicts with empty-cells. Hm.
